content.detailedDescription: Watching the olympics about 10:30 one night, there was a shot of the olympicflame from earlier in the day, i guess.  anyhow it was very clear a light shotacross the screen.  it was very fast, and in a straight line, obviously wasnt asnowflake, of anything like that.  i couldnt have been the only one to see it. it was on the channel that bob costas(nbc?) was on.
content.summary: During shot of olympic flame a bright object strea

content.detailedDescription: the witness was on a breadk from her job as an inventory controller at a companywarehouse in stevens point, wi. she was standing in a small shelter near thesouth side of the building, which provided an excellent view of the southwesternsky. her attention was caught by an orange flash low in the southwestern sky.Her initial reaction was concern that the flash might have been from an airplanecrash. however as she watched, the flash quickly faded and she noted otherlights in about the same elevation and direction. these appeared to bestationary or maneuvering.  she also saw a second pair of sustained orangeflashes (flares) appearing in the region in which the lights were maneuvering. the two flashes lasted for about 3 seconds.As the plane crash concern lessened in her mind, she now found the light showinteresting and impressive (her literal words: "cooler than fireworks").In a few minutes, she was joined by the second witness, who had also come out totake a break.  the second witness also saw the lights, but was frightened bythem - feeling that they might be associated with war. the lights were describedas being white and twinkling. they appeared to be fast moving, and weredescribed as being difficult to count.  the prime witness estimated that therewere about 5 or 6 lights.  she also noted that there were no red or green lightsassociated with them, as might be expected on aircraft. the lights motion wasgenerally such that one would seem to vanish from one spot and reappear in adifferent spot, about four inches away at arms length.  the two witnesseswatched the light show for about 10 minutes.  they then pointed them out toanother employee nearby.One light then headed quickly from the ssw sky to the southern sky where itvanished.  the other lights also disappeared, with no observable departure.
content.summary: Witnesses saw orange flashes, white lights manueve

content.detailedDescription: sirs, i was walking back from the store at theloop area near downtownand, i noticed what i thought was i bag caught in thewind. i saidto my self thats not right thats prety big for somthing like that inoticed i got light headed as the object flew topsy turvy upthe eslava creek tothe harold johnson police headquarters onhiway 90. the object was triangular andmoved quickly and thendisapered, it was just gone like turning out a light.
content.summary: Dark triangular object flying north over mobile, a

content.detailedDescription: i was going to my friends house on my scootergoing down the huge hill in my nieghborhood. i looked into the sky and saw anobject that was glowing the same shade of gold as the sun (no, it wasnt thesun). it was next to the sun so i suspspect that it was matalic and miror-like.I panicked, rode down to my friends house, told them what happened, and wentback to the hill. it was gone when we got back to the hill.
content.summary: It was a gold hovering oval

content.detailedDescription: On the verrazzano bridge approaching the toll plaza - about 2,000 feet away - wesaw a round object hovering over the plaza - it looked like the forum in l.A.,with windows shaped like arcs. it hovered for about 2 minutes, then the windowsexhibted white and red lights in series, and then it shot off to the north at agreat speed, and with with no noise. we asked several people at the plaza ifthey saw it - and none did.Years later, around 1970, i think, the village voiceran a front page article on a new jersey ufo landing - the drawing for thearticle was very similar to the craft we saw. i emailed the voice several timesto get a reprint, but they never responded.
content.summary: Observed ufo over verrezzano bridge toll plaza

content.detailedDescription: this photo was taken several years ago and ididnt notice any unfamiliar object in the sky while takeing the photo whichshows 9 bald eagles flying in formation. directly behind the eagles is a hugeobject blended in the clouds which appear to be swirling around the edges of theobject, as if the object is moving and disturbing the clouds. the object looksinvisible until you look closer, the shape is clearly visible in the clouds. idont have the original negative or know where the rest of the photos on theroll are. i would like to submit this photo for scientific analysis, would haveto get a copy made. are you interested?
content.summary: Have photo of huge object in sky blended in with t
Unknown orange lights in the colorado sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked across westminster bridge goingtowards big ben when 3 bright balls apeeared above the house of parliament to myleft. they were re-orange and moved very fast. in addition they twirled aroundeach other. they were very clear to see although it lasted only about 3 or 4seconds. i was calm but stunned that this appeared above the house of parliamentin central london. the balls sped away over the building and simply disappeared.
content.summary: 3 red-orange balls above house of parliament, lond

content.detailedDescription: Subj:re: 1-725 date:7/1/02 1:44:03 am central daylight timefrom:@hotmail.Comto:flmufonsd@aol.Comsent from the internet (details)hi, i am currently living in hawaii, however the sighting i believe you aretalking about happened about 10 miles south of defuniak springs or about 10miles north of freeport and continued until we reached the outskirts ofniceville. ive actually had several encounters starting back in earlychildhood, and being a nightowl and an outdoorsman have been at the right placeat the right time on several occasions to witness some unusual things. thanksfor your response, sincerely, >from: flmufonsd@aol.Com >to: @hotmail.Com >subject: 1-725 >date: tue, 25 jun 2002 12:59:39 edt > >dear : > >first of all let me introduce myself, my name is bland pugh, state director >for florida mufon. i received an e-mail advising me of a sighting, that was >initiated by you. i believed i had assigned your case to an investigator, >unfortunately i was wrong and there was no follow-up. > >in trying to follow this case up, i am having difficulty in locating you, >could you tell me where you are located? > >bland >bland pugh >florida mufon state director >(850) 932-9406 >flmufonsd@aol.Com subj:re: 1-725 date:7/2/02 5:05:00 am central daylight timefrom:@hotmail.Comto:flmufonsd@aol.Comsent from the internet (details)hi, what happened is as follows. my friend chris and i had been out in thecountry side, where i was developing a 4 acre lot for personal use, all of thatday. as evening aproached we sat back, built a small fire and enjoyed 1 beereach and had a snack before driving home. when we were ready for the long ridehome we got in the car and headed out onto the dirt road my lot was on. ( 5miles from highway) i cant remember the name of the highway but it goesdirectly north and south between defuniak springs and freeport. my lot was on aspot known as rock hill, i believe one of the highest places in the state offlorida. anyway we lived in ft. walton beach and so would reach the highway andhead south, after heading east on the dirt road for five miles. then we wouldhead east again on highway 20 when we reached freeport, traveling all the wayinto ft. walton.    as soon as we left my lot we saw a light appear right abovemy car, then a second light and then a third, forming a triangle,and then fromthe first light a new light would go from it to the second and then back againto the first , then the lights would go out in the opposite order that they cameon. the lights looked similar to auto headlights. they part of one craft. thecraft was within 500 feet maybe as close as 200 feet at times. the craft stayedwith us , repeating this strange (signal?) every minute or so. we drove all theway to freeport with the craft just above us( about 12-15 miles). we stopped atthe convenience store at the intersection of highway 20 and bought a soda. whenwe left the store , turning east towards niceville/ft. walton, the craft wasright on top of us again. ( after we had seen the craft for the first 2 or 3times i asked my friend if we could stop and look more closely, but he wasdeathly afraid to do so and so i did not stop the car, i had the feeling that ifwe had stopped the craft would come down to us and was a little afraid myself)anyway, the craft followed along with us all the way to the outskirts ofniceville where it left us and headed a about half a mile to the north, thereother craft appearing the same way joined it , literally, forming one craft.There were many of them, maybe 5 or 6 . then small orbs, red in color and flyingerraticaly, would join it as well. these craft came from the woods below andfrom the horizon.  then a few craft broke off again and streaked away indifferent directions. then the craft emmitted a shower of sparks from the side , sat there a moment and shot off to the north east.  i am an airforce brat, haveserved time in the army, and am college educated. i have never seen anythinglike this in my life and have know idea what it could have been. my guess is itwas extraterestial. i know about stealth blimpsn etc. and thought maybe, but thesmall orbs (the size of beach balls) and the sudden speeds these triangularthings were capable of were just incredible.  it was a clear night and thesewere all of these were below any cloud cover anyway.     about a year beforethis , in   broad daylight, while on my lunch break , in navarre florida , iwitnessed what looked like a rusty metal cylinder fly by, heading south towardsthe gulf of mexico, approximately 150 feet directly above me and maybe 50 milesan hour making no sound. i could almost see flakes of rust on this object, ihave no idea what this was either. there were no other witnesses that i know of,my co-workers had gone to lunch and i was at the shop alone unfortunately.Recently i have read other reports of people seeing the same triangular craft,even the emmissions of sparks etc.  do you know what i saw and do you think itwas signaling us with the triangular lights and motioning light etc.?          thanks for your interest , i really saw these things and have no reason to makeit up.  my number is 808-981-0000 if you have questions or would like to hear ofmy earlier childhood experiences, i hate all this writing! lol      i haveseveral stories i should probably write down , with witnesses , but sheesh!   thanks
content.summary: My friend and i were seemingly followed for approx

content.detailedDescription: 1.  i was driving compass e (nominal s) on us 101 about 10:00 am, thurs, jan 10.   i was somewhere near the patterson exit, near the santa barbara - goletaborder.2.  i was already admiring the clear blue sky.3.  i had no clue what iwas looking at when i first noticed it.4.  i was puzzled why the pilots wouldneed to fly such advanced craft in a v,     why the lead group were flying in aclump, why they were being so brazen as to fly in broad daylight over a busyhighway.5.  assuming they were 150 ft in diameter (wild guess), they were flyingstraight at about 500 mph at around 10-12,000 ft altitude.  the lead clump of5(est.) were leading the second group (in the v) by about 20 craft length, maybe1000 yards.  the echeloning group were spaced about 5 craft lengths apart, maybe250 yards.  these estimates are based on a diameter of 150 feet. but the shipscould have been much smaller or larger.  they were about 5-10b0 from vertical, compass north from my car, flying right above and parallel tothe mountain ridge above the town.6. as i was driving well over 60 mph, i had tokeep my eyes mainly on the road.  i could only glance at the sky and drivesafely.  when i glanced back, they had disappeared.  i dont know how, but itmust have been impressively fast, as to do so would have required x-15-likespeed, a cloaking capability, or both.
content.summary: 5 silvery discs flying in v lead by 5 more in clus
Circle of lights over peru, indiana

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, and i saw a bright green light fly across the sky fasterthan i have ever seen anything fly across the sky before.  within about 2seconds it had dissappeared over the horizon!
content.summary: Green light shooting across the sky
It was creepy

content.detailedDescription: Phelicopter appearing aircraft circlingresidential area very low.  my daughter called to me and said, come see this.  ithink its military or something.  i was shocked at how low it was.  it circledonce, swooped down, and came at us flying even lower.  it was like a dark green,may be blackish.  it hovered over my neighbors house and appeared wobbly.  wethought it was having mechanical problems and might fall on us.  it justhovered.  finally it began to move and we were happy!  but it moved slowly andpassed right over our heads. it then stopped and hovered right above our homesdriveway, almost directly above my head.  i shouted for my daughters to get inthe house.  i followed and called the police.  they knew nothing about it.  iran back outside with the phone in my hand and it had vanished. my daughter sawit head straight south very rapidly after we went inside.  very strange.
content.summary: Unidentified flying object hovering over home
Saw large brightly lit object falling through sky

content.detailedDescription: I have had a few occurances last year that i consider contact. with whom orwhat, i am not sure. can you assist me? the situations i have experienced havebeen telepathic in nature and occurred during relaxation (2 experiences) and (1experience while sleeping). however, it was not a dream. i was shown earthlyevironmental occurances, examined, and taught - 3 seperate occassions - 3seperate situations. please contact me if you can shed light, i will be happy toprovide more information as needed. i do not have enough room to explain indetail here.
content.summary: E.T. contact?

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to a basketball game and we witnessed lights similar to ahelicopter or small plane up ahead. what made it weird was that it kept flashinga very bright light, similar to a lighthouse motion, very quick and randmoly. aswe approached the craft, it would begin to move one way as it were goingsomehwere, and all of a sudden it would stop and emit another beam of light.There was one or two lights on the craft, and we became certain that it wasneither a helicopter or a small plane due to its movements and lightpositioning. the guys in the car behind us luckily got it on tape, its visiblefor about 15 seconds and then it suddenly speeds off in the blink of an eye. thecraft was quite close to the ground, compared to any airplane. it was strange.
content.summary: Appeared to be a small plane from far until we got

content.detailedDescription: driving home on a clear warm sat. afternoon,plenty of people outside.  heading west toward college avenue on 56th street. just before reaching redlight we both noticed 3 triangle shaped objects flyingslow and low in a southernly  direction towards downtown indianapolis.  theywere in tight formation.  i rolled down my window to listen for noise but heardnone.  checked my watch which showed close to 4:30, and proceeded acrosscollege.  craft were so low we lost track of where they went.  at first we bothsaid, are they kites?  it was 60 degrees out and many people were on the street,someone had to see this beside us.  sent an email to local tv channel 13 but gotno response.  cant seem to get it out of our minds.
content.summary: Saw 3  triangle shaped  craft flying low and slow

content.detailedDescription: See paper report submitted by dick moss in may 2002
content.summary: Viewed 3 diamond shaped craft from an alley.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 20:00, on 01/15/02 witness was traveling south on bartow rd.(route98).  he was in the left hand lane to turn left onto north crystal lakeroad.  the signal light was red and he was waiting.  all of a sudden he noticeda bright light catch his eye to his left side.  it appeared to be comingdirectly towards him over some houses to his left side, maybe 200 yards away. atfirst he thought it was a plane going to crash.  this red "light" was comingdown at about a 45 degree angle.  he rolled down his window, but didnt hear anynoise which surprised him.  the he thought it maybe was a comet, but there was abright red/orange light that was surrounded by white light.  the signal lightturned green and the witness made the left turn trying to keep his eyes on theroad & light.  after making the left turn he noticed that the light/object hadchanged into three points of light (white/green) and that made it look like atriangle.  it was still decending at a 45 deg. angle and almost stopped.  thewitness then pulled off the road to get a better look.  the object/light was nowtraveling in the same direction that the witness was which was east. hecontinued to drive east and noticed several other people out watching, pulledover to the side of the road.  he didnt stop to talk to them as he was lategetting home.  the last he saw of the object it was a single light moving veryfast high in the sky.  he lost sight of the object... he was stunned.
content.summary: Unidentified lights, changing configuration three
